name: DarkForestAdventure
description:
Game Description

Dark Forest Adventure is a 3rd perspetive 3D adventure game. 

Player explores the occult foggy forest and near village, collects different resources, changes the terrains for your combat strategy and challenges the various and cunning enemies hidden in the forest. 

As you explore, the joy of discovering unkonwn and overwhelming threats await you, leading to a high sence of accomplishment.

You are able to cut down or destroy any objects you see in order to create your own combat environment. By doing this, you can create a new paths or open up new areas, as well as make enemy stuck or out of their attack range.

Set out on your journey of exploration, knight!

Instruction

Left Mouse Click to move to target, attack, collect, destory, picking items.

Mouse Scroller to adjust view.

`A` and `D` to rotate view.

`ESC` to skip beginning animation, also to quit game in game.

`H` to show help panel.

`I` to show player status (shop) panel.

`N` to quickly close messages.
